```{r}
Rain <-read.csv("Data/Rainfall.csv")
Soil <- read.csv("Data/Soil Moisture.csv")
NDVI <- read.csv("Data/eMODIS NDVI.csv")
Evap <- read.csv("Data/Evaporative Stress.csv")
Termp <- read.csv("Data/IMERG_D.csv")
Percip <- read.csv("Data/Percip.csv")
```

```{r}
library(lubridate)
Dates <- data.frame(date = seq(as.Date('2000-01-01'), as.Date('2022-01-01'), "month"))
Dates$month <- month(Dates$date)
Dates$year <- year(Dates$date)
```
